Translations.Text: Inna: "atent an issi, ma taanam
S tudert ik, ar ddebdeben si ssekoan nnsen
Iwwet iten usu$u, tafrara
Nesrewt ip. Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur n yieoa n talaxt
Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i wid issnen ad ssikden
Apan, ih, deg ubrid n yal ass
Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i lmumnin
Ih, llan At Teegi, war ccekk, d imednas
Nerra d ppao segsen. Ihi, atent an, snat nni, deg ubrid ibanen
Ni$ At Leioo skaddben imazanen
Nebbwi yasen d issekniyen nneÂ£. Wexxoen asen
Llan qqazen ixxamen n laman, deg idurar
Iwwet iten usu$u, tauebeit
Ulay sen ixdem wayen la keppben
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep. Imir a d ias, war ccekk. Ihi, ssuref s lekyasa
Ih, Mass ik d Axellaq, d Amusnaw
Ni$ Nefka yak d ua i usniles, akked Leqwoan ameqwoaean
Ur pmuqul ar wayen is N$at kra n twaculin nnsen. Ur $webbel ilmend nnsen. Zger tacvai ik $ef lmumnin
Ini: "nekkini, s tidep, d aneddao ipbegginen
Akken id Nessers i wid ibvan
